mapper.insert: INSERT INTO festival (f_contentid, f_sigungucode, f_title, f_addr1, f_addr2, f_eventstartdate, f_eventenddate, f_firstimage, f_mapx, f_mapy, f_areacode, f_tel) VALUES (#{contentid}, #{sigungucode}, #{title}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{eventstartdate}, #{eventenddate}, #{firstimage}, #{mapx}, #{mapy}, #{areacode}, #{tel})
mapper.select: select * from festival where #{selectDate} between f_eventstartdate and f_eventenddate
